title: A RESOLUTION AUTHORIZING THE MUNICIPAL GOVERNMENT OF LOS BANOS (MGLB) THROUGH THE LOCAL CHIEF EXECUTIVE HONORABLE NEIL ANDREW N. NOCON TO ENTER INTO A MEMORANDUM OF UNDERSTANDING (MOU) WITH THE TUNTUNGIN-PUTHO INTEGRATED NATIONAL HIGH SCHOOL REPRESENTED BY ITS SCHOOL PRINCIPAL MS. SOLEDAD S. VILLANUEVA, PUBLIC SCHOOL DISTRICT SUPERVISOR AND WORK IMMERSION FOCAL PERSON MR. GASPAR HOWELL F. MINGA FOR THE WORK IMMERSION PROGRAM (WIP) OF THE ACADEMIC INSTITUTION'S SENIOR HIGH SCHOOL STUDENTS REGISTERED UNDER THE ACADEMIC YEAR 2025-2026.
